settings.name: disable_l2cache
settings.description: Disable ARM access to GPU's L2 cache. Needs corresponding L2 disabled kernel.

settings.name: gpu_mem
settings.description: GPU memory in megabyte. Sets the memory split between the ARM and GPU. ARM gets the remaining memory. Min 16.

settings.name: gpu_mem_256
settings.description: GPU memory in megabyte for the 256 MB Raspberry Pi. Ignored by the 512 MB RP. Overrides gpu_mem. Max 192.

settings.name: gpu_mem_512
settings.description: GPU memory in megabyte for the 512 MB Raspberry Pi. Ignored by the 256 MB RP. Overrides gpu_mem. Max 448.

settings.name: gpu_mem_1024
settings.description: GPU memory allocation in MB for 1024MB board revision. This option overrides gpu_mem.

settings.name: disable_pvt
settings.description: Disable adjusting the refresh rate of RAM every 500 ms (measuring RAM temperature).

settings.name: cma_lwm
settings.description: When GPU has less than cma_lwm (low water mark) memory available it will request some from ARM.

sections.title: Codecs
sections.description: Hardware decoding of additional codecs can be enabled by purchasing a license that is locked to the CPU serial number of your Raspberry Pi. Up to 8 licenses per CODEC can be specified as a comma seperated list.

settings.name: decode_MPG2
settings.description: License key to allow hardware MPEG-2 decoding.

settings.name: decode_WVC1
settings.description: License key to allow hardware VC-1 decoding.

sections.title: Audio
sections.description: The onboard audio output uses config options to change the way the analogue audio is driven, and whether some firmware features are enabled or not.
